note.p: Research Field: Theoretical physics, theoretical chemistry
Career: Professor of Theoretical Physics, Bristol University; John Humphrey Plummer Professor of Theoretical Chemistry, Cambridge University ( 1931-1953)
AssocMaterial: CSAC 2/73. Papers deposited in Churchill College, Cambridge
Obituaries: Biographical Memoirs of Fellows of the Royal Society 1955 vol 1 pp 175-184, plate, by N F Mott
